web_snippets: Hugh E. Sawyer (born 1954/55) is an American businessman. He is the former CEO of Regis Corporation, the largest hair salon chain in the world.
Mr. Sawyer served as the Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Regis Corporation, a corporation that owns, franchises and operates beauty salons ...
Michael Sawyer is an Associate Professor of English. His work focuses on the revolutionary potentiality of Black people.
